sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Positions of the vvord Hades that it is the generall place of soules: and holdeth as vvell the godly vvhich are in paradise, as the vvicked that are in Tartarus. With a catalogue of our heresies, from which one word handled by a right Grecian would haue saued vs. To the BB. of England. By Hugh Broughton 1605. Broughton, Hugh, 1549-1612.
[2], 14 p.
S.n.], [Amsterdam? : 1605.
Place of publication suggested by STC. Ends on A? In both copies A8v has the catchword "done so:", but this is possibly an error in the position of the words. One copy has added at the foot in contemporary manuscript "finis" --STC. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======
